#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <utility>

using namespace std;

pair<size_t, size_t> dp[1001];

int main() {
  size_t T;
  scanf("%zd", &T);
  while (T--) {
    size_t N;
    scanf("%zd", &N);
    size_t bestest = 1;
    for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
      pair<size_t, size_t> s;
      scanf("%zd", &dp[i].first);
      dp[i].second = 1;
      for (size_t j = 0; j < i; ++j) {
        if (dp[j].first > dp[i].first)
          continue;
        dp[i].second = std::max(dp[i].second, dp[j].second + 1);
      }
      bestest = max(bestest, dp[i].second);
      //dp[i] = s;
    }
    printf("%zd\n", bestest);
  }
  return 0;
}
